item.title: Robinhood has already outperformed the S&P 500 this year. Truist thinks it can still go further
item.description: Truist's price target implies upside of 30% ahead for shares of Robinhood.

item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Dow Industrials each posted a third straight losing session on Tuesday as investors contended with the latest jobs report.

item.title: Bank of America says this hotel stock will be a winner because of the World Cup
item.description: The bank reiterated its buy rating on the hospitality stock.

item.title: How Costco may soon make investors happy again — with a special dividend
item.description: Some on Wall Street expect to hear good news early next year.

item.title: This chip play’s strong 2025 run could hit a speed bump as earnings loom, charts show
item.description: Micron is toting a sizable gain on a year-to-date basis as its earnings release approaches, but that momentum may not last.
